title: Botanical Soaks
description: Think of our soaks like a gentle juice cleanse through your skin. With ingredients like pink himalayan salt, red beet powder, matcha green tea, cbd, and activated charcoal, our potent bath soaks combine salts, superfoods, binders, plant extracts and essential oils to help detox impurities and target symptoms naturally.
